sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import { NormalButton, NormalSelect } from 'component/common'; import './style.scss' import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { bindActionCreators } from "redux"; import { history } from 'helpers'; import { getCommonApi, commonCreateApi } from 'redux/actions/common'; // import logo from 'assets/images/logo.png' export class CustomerReceiptClass extends Component { state = { responseData: {}, downloadlLink: "" } componentDidMount() { this.props.getCommonApi(`customerreceiptprint/?sa_transacno=${this.props.match.params.id}`).then((res) => { this.setState({ responseData: res }) }) this.handlePrint() } // for get Print response handlePrint = () => { this.props.getCommonApi(`receiptpdf/?sa_transacno=${this.props.match.params.id}`).then((res) => { this.setState({ downloadlLink: res.data }) }) } // for share reciept handleShare = () => { this.props.commonCreateApi(`receiptpdfsend/?sa_transacno=${this.props.match.params.id}`).then((res) => { this.setState({ responseData: res }) }) } // for send sms reciept handleSendSMS = () => { this.props.commonCreateApi(`receiptpdfsendsms/?sa_transacno=${this.props.match.params.id}`).then((res) => { this.setState({ responseData: res }) }) } render() { let { responseData = {}, downloadlLink } = this.state let { hdr_data = [], dtl_data = [], sub_data = {}, taud_data = [], footer = {}, company_hdr = {}, taud_sub = {} } = responseData; return ( <>

{company_hdr ? company_hdr.name : ""}

{company_hdr ? company_hdr.address : ""}

Code:
: {hdr_data ? hdr_data.sa_custno : ""}
Name:
: {hdr_data ? hdr_data.sa_custname : ""}
{/*
Member:
: {hdr_data ? hdr_data.member : ""}
*/}
Trans:
: {hdr_data ? hdr_data.trans : ""}
Date:
: {hdr_data ? hdr_data.sa_date : ""}
Time:
: {hdr_data ? hdr_data.sa_time : ""}
Issued
: {hdr_data ? hdr_data.issued : ""}
No.
Description
Qty
Net price
Paid
Balance
Sold/Service By
{ dtl_data.length > 0 ? dtl_data.map((item, index) => { return (
{index+1}
{item.dt_itemdesc}
{item.dt_qty}
{item.dt_transacamt}
{item.dt_deposit}
{item.balance}
{item.staffs}
) }) : "" }
{/*
{sub_data.sub_total}
*/}
{sub_data.tot_qty}
{sub_data.tot_net}
{sub_data.tot_paid}
{sub_data.tot_bal}
No
Type
Amount
{taud_data.length > 0 ? taud_data.map((item, index) => { return (
{item.pay_rem1}
{item.pay_type_name}
$ {item.pay_amt}
) }) : ""}
{taud_sub.gst_label}
Total
{taud_sub.total}
Sub Total :
{sub_data.sub_total}
GST :
{taud_sub.gst}
Rounding :
{taud_sub.rounding}
Grand Total :
{taud_sub.grand_tot}
{/* used payment list */}

Remark: {footer.remark}

{footer.footer1 ?

1. {footer.footer1}

:""} {footer.footer2 ?

2. {footer.footer2}

:""} {footer.footer3 ?

3. {footer.footer3}

:""} {footer.footer4 ?

4. {footer.footer4}

:""}
Customer Signature
window.open(downloadlLink)} label="Print" success={true} className="print" />
); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ appointmentDetail: state.appointment.appointmentDetail, }) const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return bindActionCreators({ getCommonApi, commonCreateApi }, dispatch) } export const CustomerReceipt = connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(CustomerReceiptClass)
